name: Pasta
recipe: Boil pasta. Make sauce with tomato, garlic, and cheese. Mix with olive oil and basil. Serve warm.

name: Omelette
recipe: Beat eggs with salt and pepper. Fry onions in oil, pour in eggs, cook until set. Serve hot.

name: Salad
recipe: Chop lettuce, tomato, cucumber. Toss with lemon juice and olive oil.

name: Fried Rice
recipe: Cook rice. Stir-fry vegetables and egg. Add rice and soy sauce. Garnish with spring onion.

name: Grilled Cheese
recipe: Butter bread slices. Place cheese in between. Grill until golden brown.

name: Pancakes
recipe: Mix flour, milk, egg, sugar, and baking powder. Cook on pan with butter. Serve warm.

name: Tomato Soup
recipe: Cook tomatoes, onion, and garlic. Blend until smooth. Boil with salt and pepper.

name: Chocolate Cake
recipe: Mix all ingredients. Bake at 180°C for 30 minutes.

name: Chicken Curry
recipe: Fry onion, ginger, and garlic with spices. Add chicken and tomato. Cook until chicken is tender.

name: Fruit Smoothie
recipe: Blend banana, strawberry, milk, and honey until smooth. Serve chilled.

name: Vegetable Stir Fry
recipe: Heat oil, sauté garlic and ginger. Add vegetables and stir fry. Add soy sauce before serving.

name: Margarita Pizza
recipe: Spread sauce on base. Add mozzarella and basil. Bake at 200°C for 20 minutes.

name: Caesar Salad
recipe: Toss lettuce, parmesan, croutons, and grilled chicken with caesar dressing.

name: French Toast
recipe: Dip bread in egg-milk mixture. Fry in butter until golden brown.

name: Veggie Burger
recipe: Assemble bun with patty, cheese, lettuce, tomato, and mayo. Serve with fries.

name: Chicken Sandwich
recipe: Layer chicken, lettuce, and tomato on bread with mayo. Grill if desired.

name: Mushroom Soup
recipe: Cook mushrooms, onion, and garlic. Blend and add cream. Season with salt and pepper.

name: Falafel Wrap
recipe: Stuff pita with falafel, lettuce, tomato, and drizzle tahini.

name: Biryani
recipe: Cook rice separately. Layer marinated chicken with rice and spices. Cook on low flame.

name: Tacos
recipe: Cook beef with seasoning. Fill tortillas with beef, cheese, lettuce, and tomato. Serve.

name: Samosa
recipe: Prepare potato-pea filling with spices. Wrap in flour dough. Deep fry until golden.

name: Falafel
recipe: Blend chickpeas with onion, garlic, parsley, and spices. Shape into balls and deep fry.

name: Spring Rolls
recipe: Fill wrappers with stir-fried vegetables. Roll and seal. Deep fry until crispy.

name: Shawarma
recipe: Marinate chicken in yogurt and spices. Grill and serve in pita with garlic sauce.

name: Gulab Jamun
recipe: Make dough with milk powder and flour. Shape into balls, fry, and soak in sugar syrup.

name: Pav Bhaji
recipe: Cook and mash vegetables with spices. Serve hot with butter-toasted pav bread.

name: Ramen
recipe: Cook noodles in broth. Add soy sauce, vegetables, and boiled egg. Serve hot.

name: Burrito
recipe: Fill tortilla with rice, beans, chicken, and cheese. Wrap tightly and serve.

name: French Toast
recipe: Dip bread in egg-milk mixture. Fry with butter until golden on both sides.

name: Pad Thai
recipe: Stir-fry noodles with egg, tofu, and sauce. Top with crushed peanuts.

name: Butter Chicken
recipe: Cook chicken with spiced tomato gravy. Add cream and butter before serving.

name: Lasagna
recipe: Layer cooked sheets with meat sauce and cheese. Bake until golden.

name: Idli
recipe: Ferment rice and dal batter. Steam in molds until soft and fluffy.

name: Dosa
recipe: Spread fermented batter thin on a hot pan. Cook until crispy.

name: Fish Curry
recipe: Cook onion, tomato, and spices. Add fish and coconut milk. Simmer until done.

name: Momos
recipe: Fill flour wrappers with spiced vegetables or chicken. Steam until cooked.

name: Pasta Alfredo
recipe: Cook pasta. Make creamy garlic sauce with butter and cheese. Mix and serve.

name: Pizza
recipe: Spread sauce on base. Add toppings and cheese. Bake until cheese melts.
